title: OPPO kicks off ColorOS 12 beta program for the OPPO A53s and Reno 4 Z
content:
OPPO recently shared the ColorOS 12 beta release timeline for March 2022. According to the schedule, the Chinese OEM planned on releasing beta builds of its latest software to the OPPO A53s 5G, Reno 4 Z 5G, and the Reno 7 Pro 5G this month. In addition, the company shared details about the stable ColorOS

The post OPPO kicks off ColorOS 12 beta program for the OPPO A53s and Reno 4 Z appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OPPO has opened ColorOS 12 beta program for the OPPO A53s and Reno 4 Z, giving users a chance to experience Android 12 ahead of the stable release.
